definition: Logue or Rogge (name)/Jacques Rogge, president of International Olympic Committee (IOC)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Hiya, Rog. Frank, you all set?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好，罗格。佛兰克，你都搞定了吗？

sentences.english: What have we learnt from the rosiglitazone saga?
sentences.chinese: 从罗格列酮事件中我们学到了什么？

sentences.english: Conclusion The insulin-sensitizing drugs, rosiglitazone and metformin, are effective in the treatment of NAFLD.
sentences.chinese: 结论罗格列酮和二甲双胍可有效治疗大鼠NAFLD。

sentences.english: Rosiglitazone was put into the drinking water. The observing time was 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 罗格列酮为观察药，溶于饮水中，实验期8周。

sentences.english: President Rogge’s interview on Weibo also created waves offline.
sentences.chinese: 罗格主席的在线访谈也在线下掀起了高潮。

sentences.english: Now we visit the apartment of the Rogarshevsky family ofthe Lithuania.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们来到罗格柴夫斯基一家的公寓。

sentences.english: During the process, Logue and Albert form an unbreakable bond.
sentences.chinese: 在这段过程中，罗格和亚伯特发展出牢不可破的情谊。

sentences.english: But Rogoff cautioned against equating that skill with forecasting.
sentences.chinese: 但是罗格夫警告说，不要把这种技能与预测划等号。

sentences.english: No difference between rosiglitazone and pioglitazone was apparent.
sentences.chinese: 罗格列酮和匹格列酮间无明显差别。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of rosiglitazone in the treatment of obese type 2 diabetics.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察罗格列酮治疗肥胖型2型糖尿病的疗效。

sentences.english: Rosiglitazone and pioglitazone are part of a group of drugs called thiazolidinediones.
sentences.chinese: 罗格列酮和吡咯列酮同属噻唑烷二酮类。

sentences.english: Now we visit the apartment of the Rogarshevsky family of Lithuania.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们来到罗格柴夫斯基一家的公寓。

sentences.english: The IOC president said the past 16 glorious days will be cherished forever.
sentences.chinese: 罗格说这过去的16个盛日将会被永远铭记在心。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
